description:
Show all active filters prominently in a persistent chip bar with individual remove buttons and a clear-all option. Indicate when filters are hiding results the user might expect to see.

**Rationale:** Users forget active filters and become confused when expected entities don't appear in lists. They search repeatedly or assume data is missing. Hidden filter state is a common source of 'the system is broken' complaints.
title: Complex Filter State Visibility and Reset
